= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_NEW_VM
= General description = This action is used to create a new VM in the vCenter server. User needs to provide atleast one of Target Place (Resource Pool, Datacenter, VApp) or VMHost or both.
Note: * If user does not provide an input to "Destination Folder" or gives the input as "/", the VM will be created at the root of the datacenter. * If Target Place is selected as "None", It doesnot take targetplace name into account.
= Failure Conditions = * Neither target place nor VMHost is provided. * There is not enough space on corresponding Datastore to provision the VM. * There is an existing VM with the same name at the destination folder.
= Inputs = * Server IP or DNS : Specify IP address or DNS name of the vSphere server to which you want to connect. E.g. www.myvcenter.com * Username : Username which will be used for this connection. E.g. domain\username * Password : Password to your username. * Port : Specify port which will be used for connection. E.g. 8080 * Protocol : Specify protocol you want to use for connection. E.g. https, http * Virtual Machine name : Specify Name of the Virtual Machine you want to create. E.g. TeamVm * Guest OS ID : Specify the guest operating system identifier for the new Virtual Machine. Eg. ubuntu64Guest. For list of all Guest OS Ids visit the description of the VirtualMachineGuestOsIdentifier enumeration type in the vSphere API Reference available at http://www.vmware.com/support/developer/vc-sdk/ * Datacenter name : Specify a datacenter in which Virtual Machine will be created. Eg. uDCenter * Target Place : Select either Resource pool, Cluster or VApp in which VM will be created. * Target Place name : Type a name of either Cluster, Resource Pool or VApp in which Virtual Machine will be created. * Host name : Specify the host on which you want to create the new Virtual Machine. Eg. myvmhost * Datastore name : Specify the datastore where you want to place the new Virtual Machine. Eg. myDatastore * Destination Folder path : Specify full folder path in which you want to create new Virtual Machine. Eg. rootfolder/subfolder * Network name : Specify the networks to which you want to connect the new Virtual Machine. Provide multiple networks separated by ",". Eg VM1 network,VM2 nw * Memory size in GB : Specify size of memory in gigabytes. E.g. 0.75 * Disk size in GB : Specify size of disk. Multiple disks can be separated by ",". E.g. 40,100 * Number of CPUs : Specify number of virtual CPUs for this VM. Minimum value is 1. * Overwrite Agent : Overwrites the default agent * Overwrite Login : Overwrites the default login
= Behaviour = (none)
=Return Value= (none)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is 1 in case of failure.
= Logging = Logs will be displayed in the AE report.
= Example = (none)
